subject: Soccer
Basketball
NBA Championship
lead_paragraph: Most fans point to the Browns’ 1964 N.F.L. championship as the city’s last true crown, but the Cleveland Crunch, an indoor professional soccer team, won three league titles.
snippet: Most fans point to the Browns’ 1964 N.F.L. championship as the city’s last true crown, but the Cleveland Crunch, an indoor professional soccer team, won three league titles.
